answers.answer: It's so not a big deal. Don't be nervous. All you do is drink a beverage with a lot of glucose in it which is sugar and wait an hour and have a blood test. I actually have gestational diabetes and I'm 30 weeks, it can be managed in many ways, not saying it's awesome or anything but it's something that can be taken care of.

I failed the 1 hour but passed the 3 hour one.  No biggie. Not to make you nervous,  but a lot of women fail the first,  but pass the next one :) you'll be fine. Avoid anything sugary before midnight.  I had to fast for both of mine. Good luck!

question: Ok ladies! I've got my glucose test today! Wish me luck and please PLEASE pray for me, I've never been so nervous about a test in my pregnancy...Thank you!
title: Beyond Nervous!!
